content: The Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game. It is one of the best weapons in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tri-Point_Double-Edged_Spear.md', within the main section titled 'Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear'.
The content is as follows:
The Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game. It is one of the best weapons in the game.
